history: Reference config for DFOLS algorithm. Perturbing all 14 parameters
svnInfo_comment: Information automatically updated by SVN -- please don't edit
Developer_comment: StudyConfig.py provides methods that work with this configuration file. Remember to change them if you change structure of this.
Name: dfols_r
baseRunID_comment: base for runID. Only first two characters are generally used.
runTime_comment: Time in seconds for run. Run for a 6 years 4 months should take about 9200 seconds ~ 3 hours.
runCode_comment: Project code to run job under.
machineName_comment: Name of machine to submit runs to
modelName_comment: Name of model that is ran
optimiseFunction_comment: Name of optimisation function to run. null gives default
fakeFunction_comment: Name of fake function to use for testing. null gives default. Your fake fn should match your postProcess function which it fakes.
runUpgrade_vn3: For vn3 put all runXXX & function stuff in a runInfo block.

defaultParams.comment: Default parameter values for HadAM3. null values or not set mean don't modify. Checked against wiki 11/5/17
defaultParams.CW_LAND_comment: Seed parameter which also affects CW_SEA
defaultParams.DYNDIFF_comment: Seed parameter which affects DIFF_COEFF, DIFF_COEFF_Q, DIFF_EXP & DIFF_EXP_Q
defaultParams.KAY_GWAVE_comment: Seed parameter which also affects KAY_LEE_GWAVE
defaultParams.CHARNOCK_comment: Note this is Murphy et al, 200X and is different from that reported in Yamazaki et al, 2013
defaultParams.ALPHAM_comment: Seed parameter which affects DTICE and ALPHAM
defaultParams.RUN_TARGET_comment: Run target -- time as 3 to 6 element array to run for.

initParams.comment: Intial values for parameters to be optimised. Set to null to use default values. Values below are for HadAM3-14#1

Parameters.initScale_comment: If true then startParams range from 0 to 1 where 0 means min value; 1 max value.

fixedParams.comment: List of parameters and values that are fixed and not modified in optimisation. Set to null to use default values

Parameters.fixedScale_comment: If true then scalable fixedParams range from 0 to 1 where 0 means min value; 1 max value.

minmax.comment: Defines the minimum and maximmum ranges for the parameters. Must be defined for ALL parameters used in GN optimisation,

steps.comment: Steps for perturbations -- norm around 10% of the range. If not specified 10% will be used. Values below are from 7 parameter cases described in Tett et al, 2017 (GMDD. They are not particualry optimal

study.comment: Parameters that specify the study. Used by framework and not by optimisation routines
study.referenceModelDirectory_comment: Directory where reference model configuration exists. Default is START_DIR/start

covariance.comment: Covariance matrices and operations on them. If CovObsErr and CovIntVar are *both* specified then CovTotal will be computed from them
covariance.CovTotal_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for total Error.
covariance.CovTotalDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the total covariance matrix
covariance.CovIntVar_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix of Internal Variability
covariance.CovIntVarDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the internal variability covariance matrix
covariance.CovObsErr_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for Observational Error
covariance.CovObsErrDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the Observational Error covariance matrix

study.ObsList_comment: List of Observations that Algorithm uses which should be generated by post processing of model
study.constraintName_comment: Name of constraint variable -- target value defined by targets/constraintName.

optimise.comment: Parameters to control optimisation. This is used within DFOLS optimisation routines AND not by framework
optimise.mu_comment: The inverse weighting given to the constraint -- it gets wt 1/(2mu). If Null then no constraint should be applied

dfols.growing.ndirs_initial_comment: the number of perturbations on first iteration. If not specified then will make Nparm perturbtions
dfols.rhobeg_comment: Radius of parameter trust region at start
dfols.rhoend_comment: Radius of paramater trust region for termination (for our purpose this is in normalised parameters)
dfols.maxfun_comment: Maximum number of model evaluations to be done. Default is O(1000). reduced to 90 so have data to do a mid-point look at
dfols.scaling_within_bounds_comment: Scale internally so all in range 0 to 1

namedSettings.logging.save_poisedness_comment: whether or not  to calculate geometry statistics as part of diagnostic information
namedSettings.init.random_initial_directions_comment: If true perturb in random directions. If true perturb along co-ordinate axis.
namedSettings.noise.additive_noise_level_comment: Estimate of noise in cost function. Used in termination -- nb cost fn is sum of squares **not** sum of squares/nObs. Note corrected 9/5/19 after d1061 had started. Should be nobs??
namedSettings.logging.save_xk_comment: Save the full vector of trial values
namedSettings.noise.quit_on_noise_level_comment: quit/restart if all trial evaluations are within noise level of last iteration
namedSettings.general.check_objfun_for_overflow_commen: Presumably check that function behaves itself
namedSettings.slow.history_for_slow_comment: No of past successful iterations to look at to decide if slow or not
namedSettings.slow.thresh_for_slow_comment: Log cost function  change for slow converegence
namedSettings.slow.max_slow_iters_comment: The number of itertions (once slow determined) to decide making slow progress
namedSettings.restarts.use_restarts_comment: Restart when slow convergence or too noisy
namedSettings.restarts.use_soft_restarts_comment: Use soft restart -- reuse some existing points when  restarting
namedSettings.restarts.soft.num_geom_steps_comment: How many extra runs to be done when restarting
namedSettings.restarts.increase_npt_comment: Increase number of points when restarting
namedSettings.restarts.increase_npt_amt_comment: Number of points to increase by in restarts.increase_npt set when restarting
namedSettings.restarts.max_unsuccessful_restarts_comme: Number of consecutive restarts allowed when no progress made
namedSettings.restarts.hard.increase_ndirs_initial_amt: How many points to increase by  when doing hard restart (not using any exisiting pts)
namedSettings.restarts.max_npt_comment: Maximum number of points/model evals in each restart

dfols.NamedSettings_comment: Settings for named parameters that get passed into dfols via user_params

postProcess.comment: Options to control post processing. Details depend on your post processing script.
postProcess.script_comment: Full path name -- including any environment variables you might have -- to postprocessing script
postProcess.outputPath_comment: output path relative to model dir -- should be one of .nc, .json or .csv. Default is observations.nc
postProcess.note: Specify mask_file -- file where l/s mask is, name of mask, start and end times
postProcess.mask_file_comment: Path to mask file. Example value is for N48 HadAM3
postProcess.mask_name_comment: Name of mask variable. Depends on file..
postProcess.start_time_comment: Start time as YY,MM, DD, Hr, Min, Sec
postProcess.end_time_comment: End time as YY,MM, DD, Hr, Min, Sec

targets.comment: Observed targets for optimisation. Should include constraint value.

scalings.comment: Scalings on observables -- only defined when not 1.0

SimulatedValues.comment: Values from Initial Cond ensemble -- used for display
